description: Who doesn't love cheese? It's one of my favorite things, so of course, I make a MEAN halloumi salad! Give it a try.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Potato salad,Sesame free,Microwave,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Spinach
name: Halloumi & Sweet Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut sweet potato into rounds and bake until soften but not mushy. Meanwhile bake onion at the same time (onion should be sliced).
Defrost corn and cook in the microwave for 30 seconds, leaving a lid on to allow to steam.
Prepare baby spinach and place into the bowl ready to be topped.
Prepare dressing by mixing mustard, oil, vinegars and chili sauce. Taste and adjust flavours as you please.
Top spinach with corn, sweet potato, onion and finally the cheese before dressing and tossing.
